page.title: 11A DAY WITH THE PARKER FAMILY
page.content: It was 07.30.hrs. in our house and suddenly:"brrrrrrr!" it was my sister's alarm clock. My sister groaned and pressed the button. I pulled the covers off and got out of bed. I got washed and went downstairs.Imade my packed lunch, had some sugar puffs and orange juice. I turned on TV_AM and watched a bit, then I went back into my room and brushed my teeth. I got my P.E. kit ready and went off to school. As soon as I got to school the bell rang and everyone went in. We got our A_Day Maths out"Caroline, hurry up and get your work out "said Mrs Paul. We went into assembly where we sang a hymn and had a story. Back in the classroom we did some more maths_ALGEBRA! I sat next to Eunice because we were both doing the same work.
